definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
Sint Maarten, island country in the Caribbean
Martin Luther (1483-1546), key figure of the Protestant Reformation
Martin Luther King, Jr. (1929-1968), American clergyman and civil rights activist

sentences.english: Now, Mr. Martin is on the 10 floor. The attendant comes to meet Mr. Matin.
sentences.chinese: 馬丁先生到了十樓，服務員走過來迎接他。

sentences.english: In the desert Bridgit gives Gaines the ID.
sentences.chinese: 在沙漠中，布瑞吉特將馬丁的身份證交給了蓋恩斯。

sentences.english: Drunk about the place and capering with Martin's umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 她喝得醉醺醺的，掄着馬丁的雨傘歡蹦亂跳。

sentences.english: Martin teamed up with a colleague to write the report.
sentences.chinese: 馬丁和一個同事共同寫這份報告。

sentences.english: Martin recollected his blank-verse tragedy, and sent it instead.
sentences.chinese: 馬丁想起了他的素體詩悲劇，便把它寄去充數。
我要一杯馬丁尼雞尾酒。

sentences.english: Obafemi Martins is reportedly keen to quit Newcastle United Football Club.
sentences.chinese: 報道稱，馬丁斯準備離開紐卡斯爾。
詹姆士喜歡上好的馬丁尼。

sentences.english: Joe sat on the bed while Martin unpacked.
sentences.chinese: 喬坐在牀上，馬丁打開箱子。

sentences.english: Martin took his seat amidst an uproar of voices.
sentences.chinese: 馬丁在一片鬨鬧聲中回到了座位。
馬丁逼劉易斯逼得很緊。

sentences.english: I think Martin has said sorry for the injury.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲馬丁已經就此事道過謙了。

sentences.english: What would you like to drink?A Scotch, a screw-driver or a martini?
sentences.chinese: 蘇格蘭威士忌酒，還是起子酒或馬丁尼酒？

definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
